name: Mickey Berry
text: This was such a cool place when it was in the old location! It’s ok now, but you used to be able to go in there and find anything and everything!  I think it’s more of a craft store now? The people were nice and the gentleman who helped us was very courteous.  I just didn’t find it to be like it used to be.  We’ll give it another chance!

name: Katrina Gamble Parker
text: Great place to get unique gifts and old fashioned toys for kids!

name: S Taylor
text: I bring my kids up here with me and we love this store. You can find just about anything your creative mind can conjure up.

name: Susan Woods-Ross
text: Always amazing!!! Mary Ann has the God given ability to remember most everyone who has brought their children in by name and watched our children grow up. She is truly one of a kind. We all love her!

name: Claude Freeman
text: Truly a place for a person that has everything- but not a bird whistle, or a bullet box to put remotes in. Did I mention they have seasonal stuff? Great old toys too! Highly recommend this place.

name: Kursten Terrell
text: Been coming here sonce I was a child. This is my happy place!!

name: Izz Noland
text: Great place to get all kinds of old knick knacks. They were the only place around still receiving and selling solar eclipse glasses, and opened days and hours they normally would not.

resp.text: It was truly our pleasure...thank you SO much!

name: Michael Annunziata
text: Lots of cool little things to find here. I always drop by to find stocking stuffers for Christmas

name: LA Huffstutler
text: Great for finding something different and it supported community vendor.

name: Zoe Read
text: Not a good variety store. Lots of unorganized or empty shelves.

name: Kevin Nelson
text: Wonderful store to find hard to find gifts

name: Tania
text: This place is great

name: Jessie Bunton
text: Wide variety of odds and ends, kinda pricey

name: Stuart Jinnette
text: Has a wide varity

name: Merlene Sanders
text: Such a nice place.  Sweet treats including vinegar cookies (taste like Grandma's tea cakes), fudge with many flavors from which to choose , and a great gift collection.   A unique shop.  Friendly   efficient staff.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Lisa Kaminski
text: Lots of different flavors of fudge and very nice helpful folks

name: Melissa
text: It was wonderful! The fudge was amazing and the people were 🙂 nice.

name: Juliana McMullin
text: The most delicious fudge I have ever tasted!! Thank you!!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Jesse Roney
text: OMG sooooo good.

name: Rebecca Lynne Barresi
text: You cant beat buttered pecan fudge anywhere!

name: mike orourke
text: Great fudge

name: Alba Donofrio
text: Fantastic

name: Semper Paratus
text: Fairhope sweet shop is an adorable little shop in a quaint little town on the Eastern shore of Alabama that one must visit if you happen to be exploring the area. They offer classic candy as well as New and exciting treats that is sure to satisfy just about any craving. Be sure to try their delicious Frios Ice pops too! They will cool you down from the Hot Alabama heat!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: Deanna
text: My favorite sweet shop around!!! They have all the fun cute candies, even the ones you may be searching for. Cute environment/ set up. Family friendly and very nice worker. My experience there is always positive. Good pricing and selection. Definitely worth more than a five star review. ☺️❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review!

name: Barbara Williams
text: Great little candy shop with all the familiar candies we have learned to love.  When i visited the store while we were in Fairhope, I did not feel like we were welcome in the store, but the clerk could have been having a bad day.

resp.text: Barbara, I’m so sorry that you felt unwelcome while visiting our shop. I will make sure I address the issue with our employees to make sure we correct this problem. Thank you for your feedback, we are always wanting to change for the better and feedback will help us do that. Hope you visit again soon.

name: Kara Morgan
text: Fairhope Sweet Shop is a great place to take the kids or yourself for a treat! They have all kinds of treats and candies. Cute little shop, I will definitely take my kids back next time we are in Fairhope.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review, we are so happy you enjoy our shop!

name: Jason Temple
text: Cool little boutique shop

name: Chantle Uthe
text: Love all the different yummies from my childhood.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: jack jaquess
text: Such a cute little store! Loved the atmosphere and great candy

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review! We are so happy you enjoy our shop!

name: halle vines
text: Such an awesome place!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review!

name: Sarah Towey
text: Love love love Tanner’s!! The owners go above and beyond for my family and I can see from being there I’m not alone in receiving this kind of service! Everyone is kind and helpful of course but that personal interest from the actual owners is great! I mostly buy their cheese straws - they’re the best - but I buy nuts and confections too and have never been disappointed! Buying locally is always the better choice!

name: Patrick Dawson
text: Poor Service. Have ordered from them in the past with no problems but after multiple attempts to contact them regarding a current order that shows "completed" on their website (for 2 weeks), they act clueless as to why it hasn't actually been completed or shipped. They never called back to fix the problem as promised and have not issued a refund either.

name: Addie
text: My family has been shopping with Tanners since they opened their doors in the 40's. Something has changed within their company and they no longer have the quality of customer service that they used to. I placed an order online to send as a gift and the person never got the pecans and the tracking number never even showed it was even shipped. I contacted the office manager on numerous occasions only to get the run around and many excuses. I am extremely disappointed in Tanners and will be taking my business to another pecan company in the future.

name: Sara Munkus
text:
The gourmet chocolate carmel nut apple was delicious 😋
Yummy 😋

name: Ginger Kelly
text: Great place to send Christmas  presents  from to love one's out of town

name: Kim Nicholson
text: I had a last minute order that I needed help with. Not only did they customize baskets for our budget, they were delivered same day and were beautiful! Highly recommend.

resp.text: We thank you for thinking of us to help you. We appreciate your business.

name: Mike and Jenn at Nootbaar Plumbing
text: Excellent client gift baskets! We have ordered from Tanner's for ourselves and now for our clients and we couldn't be happier. Excellent goodies with a great presentation. We got a lot of personal calls to thank us for the baskets. Great job Tanner's! As a business owner, we appreciate the great customer service paired with a superior product line.

name: Shane Holt
text: Chocolate covered potato chips? oh yeah!!! The pecan meal is great for breading fish, chicken, pork chops, and anything else you can bread. The pecan pie with chocolate chips is fantastic! Thanks to the nice lady in the office who helped me!

name: William McDaniel
text:
I give Tanner's Pecans, Candies and Gifts 5 STARS!!
These guys have the best “Southern style” Desert treats and gifts in the South and service second to none!
Danny Fox's team has always been helpful and kind to me and my family over the many years we have visited.
I HIGHLY recommend this store to anyone with a sweet tooth!
Keep up the good work!

name: Audra Jimerson
text: This company has become more than just a work place but a family. We take pride in every single thing we make here. We strive to make sure that what you are buying is the absolute best choice. If every state had any business like this one they wouldn’t know what hit them when they taste those delicious treats.

name: Steve-nSheila Bell
text: When the products and service are soooo great that you are waiting patiently - or not so patiently - for that next shipment. Now THAT is what we like!! Our favorite holidays pic is the GF Fruitcake. AWESOME!!! And other favorites for just anytime are the pecans, plain and simple.

name: Angelo Semifero
text: They have been my holiday 'Go to' for years! The pecan pies, gift baskets, divinity, and, well, everything I have tried so far are excellent!

name: monica alicea
text: Excellent product quality service if you want to eat a delicious sweet with our tanner's pecan

name: Jenna Chancey
text:
They are extremely friendly and never disappoint
, this is the best place for your sweet tooth!

name: Jerre CLARK
text: Always fresh, fine gourmet delicacies. Definitely worth it!!

name: Kendall Coleman
text: Abigail was very helpful and got the gift basket prepared for the budget I provided. It turned out great.

name: Wanda King
text:
Excellent service,  Super friendly staff, pralines and all candies are NO 1 in flavor.  They are the best pecan and pralines store to buy from.
I have ordered for a long time.  This year 2021 I got the Valentines some and chocolate cherries.  No one compares to these special gifts!

name: Salice Miller
text: The owners of Tanner's are great people. Their southern charm and hospitality keep me coming back.

name: Sherri Morris
text: My 80 year old mother went into the store and placed a Christmas order for my brother and I on Dec 14th. My brother who lives in California got his before Christmas, I still haven't received mine (12/31/18) l called and spoke to the manager on December 26th and she told me that the order was returned and back in Mobile, she said that as soon as they get it back they can resend it to me???? (GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE)she said that my mother must have given them the wrong address over the phone, my mom actually  WROTE IT DOWN  IN LARGE LETTERS AND HANDED IT TO THE CLERK, she has mailed me numerous things and I have gotten every single one of them. I asked if my mother could be compensated for the trouble and their mishap and was told she could get a %10 discount on her next order. Thats not going to happen...I would have given them no stars for their terrible customer service but can't. Maybe I'll get mine by next Christmas.

name: Cheryl West
text: They have the best pecans and candies

name: Tim Hasser
text: A very creative business that obviously takes pride in their treats from soil & seed all the way to finished product. A true staple of Mobile and right off I-65’s Exit 4.

name: Mary Hill
text: My brother sent me a tin of roasted, salted mixed nuts.  They are perfection!  I'm ordering more. What a treat!

name: Lynn Tomlin
text: Was very disappointed in the cheese straws, Mr. Tanner made the best.

name: Preston Manley
text: Great place to pick-up pecan confections and candy.

name: Shlrley Nettles
text: Very friendly and explain their change in operating.

name: Joyce Cody
text: Delicious goodies!! Experienced and helpful assistants

name: Justin Godwin
text: Friendly customer service. Wish their treats were availible year round. Delicious!

resp.text: Great news our store is open year round with limited product but we may have some of your favorites in the store. Please come by and see us anytime from 10-4 Monday thru Friday.

name: mr mrs pettway
text: Love Tony Salsa and 1031 meals

name: Josh Cocoris
text: Best pecans and holiday gifts US

resp.text: Thanks Josh!

name: Antoine English
text: Very nice people! Clean business.

name: jason harsany
text: GREAT people, products and service!!

name: Barbara Shelton
text: Very nice

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!!!

name: Debra Colbert
text: Nothing special

resp.text: Thank you for your review. If there is anything that we can do to make your experience next more desirable please let us know. We would be happy to help you in any way.

name: Sonni Hegarty
text: Tasty!

name: Brittney Reed
text: To expensive

name: Braeden
text:
Love The Birmingham Candy Company!! Great local business with even better customer service!!
I've ordered from them for two years, as well as purchasing candy for myself , and I have always been pleased! I've requested to have my orders before Christmas due to traveling out of town, and I've always had them 2-3 days in advance! The people I gave the candy to loved it and even commented that they hoped to receive candy next year, too!

name: ranilda lipsey
text: This place is awesome great candy and friendly people aways willing to help! Try the pecans you won't want to run out!!

name: L P Fink
text:
Placed an order on the 9th of December by the 18th some 9 days later it had not been shipped.  Sent an email to cancel order unless they could guarantee delivery today which they totally ignored ( recipients leaving town)  There is evidence that the USPS received the package  after 8pm on Tuesday...10 days after my order.  Still not delivered.  Disgusted with this company.

After my friends returned the candy finally arrived weeks after ordered..  These people have a good product but their business  plan is lacking, one can't rely on unreliable methods of delivery.  I suggested they use Goldbely to expedite their process of delivery.  I hope they got the memo as I like to support small businesses but they have to do their part and be on top of their  business

name: david moses
text: Wonderful place to find the best sweat candies and caramel that will take you to heaven.

name: Michael Watkins
text: Great place to satisfy your sweet tooth.

name: Alisha Wheeler
text: Best place in town for candy lovers! Get ready to be in AWE!

name: Caralee Hall
text: A large variety of candy to choose from! Some of my childhood favorites not available in stores anymore. Great prices and friendly services!

name: James Carnegie
text: Cashier was rude and unhelpful, refusing to tell me what size boxes were available. She took off her mask specifically to pull my chocolate, and put it back on when back at the register. Unacceptable quality of service.

name: Gena Rose
text: Best candy variety by the pound I've ever seen! Flavored jelly beans are the best!

name: Chris Carver
text: Amazing place for quality and taste. The young lady that helped us, Kayla, was so helpful and polite. This last stop put the dessert on our day and trip. :)

name: PATS FAN
text: Purchased a praline and it had lots of shells in it, which caused me to crack my bridge  I left two messages for Mike the owner and got no reply. Dena the store employee refused to give me back my money.

name: Sabrina Adams
text: Great service  lots of candy

name: Rita Foxwell
text: Bought "white chocolate" coconut candy. Was like biting into a hard blob of the almond bark blocks you buy from the grocery store. Very disappointed!

name: K Harris
text: I see it comes as no surprise that the owner/operator was rude. I took my girls in the store and noticed we were ignored and made to feel like an inconvenience. I heard huffing and puffing and got irritated. I said I would give her a chance to correct it once she stood at the register. She did not speak to my kids nor initiate any type communications. I have very intelligent kids and they are aware of proper social graces and purchase ettiqute. This was not what we experienced.  I will go to every review platform to make sure no one else experiences this. In this current climate , I could make this an issue of race... but I won't because with an attitude this bad I'm sure it overflows equally across all races. STAY AWAY!!! I will spend our 2hr drive home answering my kids  curiosity as to "why the lady scared them and was mad at them". This is not Right!

name: Mason Spotts
text: The lady working tonight on the 28th of July 2017 was extremely rude to me and my friend. We went in grabbed our drinks and put them on the counter and she was very short with us and acted like we had no right to be there and that we should leave. When we left we stopped in again to grab a drink for the road and she once again was extremely rude even worse than the last time. We didn't have exact change so she just very angrily told us to hand her the money and dumped out the tip jar to get the change. This is extremely poor customer service and I will not ever step foot in that shop until there are new employees that know how to actually give good customer service to someone who had bought from them for years

name: Mike
text: The best candy store to get any thing sweet

name: bad gyal TT
text: I love it here lol

name: Aimee Riley- Baldwin
text: The coldest yoo- hoo's around !

name: Clifta Hixson
text: Very, very poor service. The sales lady sat and ate and would not wait on us until we asked her for help. She was rude and taking advantage of her employer!!

name: 3344351600 Alvarez
text: We went in there because we seen a guy walk out with a cone ice cream and the lady in the register was rude saying that they where out of ice cream knowing i just seen a guy walk out with one if it had a negative star i would go with a negative one

name: Tim Bigham
text: Always good

name: Robert Smith
text: Great candy

name: Juwan Roberts
text: Bad service! No!

name: Dale Edinger
text: Good selection of area wines, beers/sours/ales... Throwback sodas, candies and speciality gourmet items...

name: mary phebus
text: The funniest employees and BEST WINE tasting ever 🍷 !

name: Monica Way
text: My favorite place to get wine!

name: Todd Oney
text: Good selection of classic candies, regional sodas, beer and wine.

name: Joann Knight
text: Very friendly place to go. Nostalgic candy and sodas as well as wine sampling and craft beers.

name: David S.
text: Fantastic customer service. Everyone is happy to help and willing to teach so you leave happy.

name: Ruth Olsen
text: Great wine selection.  Had a blast with staff and wine tasting.

name: Jennifer Black
text: We had a great time at sprakeasy. Thank you for your recommendations.

name: Lynne White
text: I get the Cheese Hooies and the Crisp Sweet Pickles. Love both of them. I try to stock up on both before I run out of them.

name: Janice Froberg
text:
I loved this little shop because it's a little hidden away gem that a lot of folks probably doesn't know exist. I didn't, until just recently.
Everything there is made from scratch; the old fashioned way. And boy... is it delicious! Their brittle candies are to die for! Everyone needs to try this place, at least once... you'll be glad you did.

name: Tere King
text: Great little shop... Cheese hooies are the bomb!!! Pecan brittle pretty tasty too...

name: Trent Eubanks
text: Nice selection of homemade goodies in wonderful southern setting. Worth the the backcountry drive for the food and to meet the proprietor.

name: Dale Parrish
text: A contractor gave me a jar of peanut brittle for Xmas.... wow best I’ve ever tasted !!!

name: Rachel Holloman
text: Absolutely great staff and wonderful products.  The brittle is divine; many of the other products are scrumptious too.

name: Genna LaPerla
text: I have loved this treat since I was a  baby. Worth the drive from Texas

name: Janet Suter
text: Fantastic!! Thank you Josie for your kindness and spending time with our Daugther. Everything we tried was scrumptious and I LOVE that it is made right there. We bought the pecan brittle and roasted garlic pecans. I grew up with a pecan tree in my Grandparents yard and we made peanut brittle all the time so I was brought right back to childhood. If you pass this place without stopping and it's open it is your loss!!!

name: Grace Howard
text: I absolutely love everything they make! The best is the Peanut Brittle that is so thin that it melts in your mouth!

name: Precision Graphics
text: Great customer service and the candy is outstanding. Highly recommended.

name: Jami D
text: The greatest candies you have ever eaten! The pecan candies and peanut brittle are both unbelievable!!

name: Barry Borum
text: Best peanut brittle on this planet. A+++

name: Roberta Bush
text: Best place to get Peanut Brittle!!

name: Catfish 5235
text: Best brittle  around

name: Cheryl Merritt
text: Love it

name: Bryan Balentine
text: Yum

name: K. Allen Foster
text: Sweetest confections and sweetest folks in this area!

name: Kelli Love
text: Took my 3 granddaughters there they loved it

resp.text: Thank you Kelli! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Brenna Terry
text: Went in for the first time since they reopened under new management. Got a killer snowcone- massive in size, and they have TONS of flavors! The candy selection is incredible, and the store itself is clean. I'll be back soon for some candy and another snowcone once it warms up outside :)

resp.text: Thank you Brenna!!

name: Mizz Nye C
text: Fun little candy shop.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Just RJ
text: Good place lots of nice candy and stuff

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Vincent Schilleci
text: Our family loves Sugar! We can’t drive through Crestline without at least in if us wanting to stop in. Do yourself a favor and check it out!

resp.text: Thank you! See you soon!

name: Ryan Gibson
text: I do not recommend this place! The store was disgustingly dirty! The floor was sticky, and we were stepping on candy that had been dropped on the floor and not cleaned up. I mistook the bin holding bags to put the candy in for a trash can, because it had what looked to be used bags in it. Most of the candy bins were empty making the selection pretty small. The candy that we wanted was in a bin that my 6'2" son could barely reach. The young man working in the store just stood behind the counter watching us struggle to get the candy. A one star is being generous for this place!

resp.text: Hi Ryan! I am so sorry you had a terrible visit. The store closed shortly after that in September 2019. We rented the spot in December 2019, bought the fixtures from the old store, and reopened Sugar under new management. We stay fully stocked (we added 100 candies) and clean daily! Please come by and tell us what you think of the changes. Free samples on us!

name: Allison Wilkin
text: Great little place with the traditional candy in individual containers where you scoop your own amounts into a plastic baggie. FANTASTIC selection!

name: Jill Carter
text: I love this place! But I wish they would keep their candy more separated so we knew what was Gluten Free or "alllergy friendly" or not.

resp.text: Hi Jill! We have a brand new website that allows you to search by gluten free and peanut allergies. Please ask for help when you come in, we'll be glad to assist you.

name: Summer Smith
text: Went here for candy for a big party and it was closed. If you say you’re open, you need to be open.

resp.text: We hate that we missed you during renovations! We're back open and brand new! Mon-Sat 11-5

name: Nicole Rodgers
text: We love this candy shop!!! Reminds me of my childhood😊

name: sallie Sherrill
text: sarah franklin qwner of sugar went all out on my daughter lizzies wedding lizzie wanted macaroons instead of wedding cake  they went over and beyond my expectations the pictures of the macaroon table are unbelievable what a talented staff  they were delicious and hardly any left ordering some for my other daughters baptism thankyou sarah and staff

name: Jonathan Stewart
text: I've never been here but the sign looks neat

name: Vance Olmstead
text: Another job well done! Best florist in town that always leaves me amazed with their end result!

resp.text: Out of all the great florists in town, Vance, we're flattered to see you think we're the best. There's nothing we love more than helping you out. If you ever need another beautiful arrangement, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Donny Harden
text: thank you to the staff @ Amy's..  We live out of town, I called late morning and placed the order for our daughters birthday. I got a text and picture from daughter at 1:20 of the flowers, she was so excited, in her words "BEAUTIFUL" ...Amy's helped make a daughter and teachers day... THANK YOU!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Donny!  It's our pleasure to make sure every customer is taken care of.

name: Bobby Hagler
text: I ordered flowers for my wife on our 40th anniversary at 4:30 pm on 5/28 to be delivered between 12:00 - 2:00 pm on 5/29. They send an email at 11:57 am on 5/29 cancelling the order. This is pathetic.

resp.text: We apologize for the miscommunication in your order, Bobby. Given the long weekend for Memorial Day, we were closed Saturday and Monday. We also had a technical issue that didn't reflect our correct hours online. We understand your frustration and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If you'd like to discuss this further offline, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Camy Caruso
text: I just called there to order flowers for my daughter in law.  The lady who answered the phone was rude. She acted like it was an inconvenience.  I'm glad I didn't spend my money on the flowers there. And the 1 star was too much. Ordering somewhere else!

resp.text: Camy, I'm so disappointed to hear we've left you with such a poor impression. You should always expect to be treated like a friend when you work with us to create a beautiful arrangement, and I can assure you this was just a misunderstanding. I hope you'll consider giving us the chance to make things right. -Felisha, Owner

name: Neica Asher
text: I ordered flowers online and called with special delivery instructions. Amy's you went above and beyond with your customer service. Thanks for delivering beautiful flowers and being so friendly to the lady that received them. Excellent experience all around!

resp.text: There's nothing like getting to share smiles with our neighbors, Neica. It was our pleasure to deliver the beautiful arrangement for you. Please don't hesitate to give us a call if you ever need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: shirley smith
text: I used Google to find a place to deliver something, out of the ordinary, for a friend staying at a local hotel---and since it didn't require flowers I was at their mercy. The kind receptionist was able to help with everything in a matter of a few minutes... EXCEPTIONAL. Thank you!!

resp.text: Thanks for the support, Shirley! Glad to hear we were able to help out with your delivery. Let us know if you ever need anything else. -Felisha, Owner

name: Teddy Jackson
text: Great experience, Arrangement looked great! I will definitely use Amy's again.

resp.text: Teddy, I'm happy to hear that your order was everything you wanted. Our arrangements are some of the freshest in the area, so we're happy that you'll continue to support us. If you'd like anything specific, feel free to let us know next time. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jeri Moody
text: I called Amy's Florist from Georgia in hopes of ordering a plant for my son's girlfriend who just had surgery. Mark was a pleasure on the phone. He was very helpful in suggesting a plant, as well as tips on how to care for it. The delivery guy was also kind and delivered it promptly as well. I would definitely use Amy's again if I find myself needing another delivery in Tuscaloosa, AL. Thank you!!

resp.text:
Jeri, thanks for the stars! We're so glad to hear we were able to help you out. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else!
-Felisha, Owner

name: Larry Savino
text: I am in New York and needed a Great Easter basket for my Daughter who is in Tuscaloosa for college. I called in morning and the women I spoke with was very polite,Patent,and knowledgeable of her products. I described what I wanted she said NO PROBLEM, ask me for my budget and 3 hours latter my Daughter called and said she loved it. What more could you ask for from a vendor. Thank you to the staff at Amy's I appreciate the great service we received

resp.text: Larry, I know a year has gone by, but I just had to stop and thank you for these wonderful words! I'm happy we were able to help you make your daughter's day. I appreciate your support and hope you won't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: CATHY HOWELL
text: I went in to Amy’s to get a plant for a funeral and there was 3 different people helping us and we got 3 different prices.  So unorganized. Feel as tho they are ripping people off!!  Watch when you order!  NONE of the flowers had prices so we had to ask. We left and went to Stephanie’s where all the plants had prices you knew what you were paying for.

resp.text:
Cathy, we try to be upfront with our prices, so I'm sorry to hear you didn't leave with that impression. I appreciate your feedback, though, and I hope you'll give us another chance in the future. Take care.
-Felisha, Owner

name: Virginia Sanford
text: Always very helpful with choosing the right flower or plant. Also very helpful with last minute needs.

resp.text: Virginia, glad to hear you can always count on us! Thanks for the kind words, and we hope to see you again soon. -Felisha, Owner

name: Mona
text: I was sent some flowers by my boyfriends parents for Christmas. The whole arrangement fell apart when I got it, as they cut the stems so short they wouldn’t even stay in the container. It was mostly filler and the flowers died within 2 days. Highly disappointed.

resp.text: Mona, we're always happy to be a part of such sweet gestures. However, we searched our database history and don't see the transaction you're speaking about. I can assure you that our displays are well-made and always fresh. That's what sets our flowers above the rest. In the future, we're always happy to provide you with a quality arrangement at a moment's notice. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jennifer Stigall
text: Great experience using Amy's Florist! Very nice people to work with!  I definitely recommend using them, and they are LOCALLY Family owned!

resp.text: I know a couple of years have gone by, Jennifer, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this awesome review! Your recommendation means the world to me, and I'm so happy to read you had a great experience here. Please don't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: Christian Parris
text: I had a wonderful experience on the phone ordering flowers for my girlfriend. Cynthia was very helpful and funny

resp.text: Thank you Christian!  We hope your girlfriend enjoys her flowers.

name: M P
text: Terrible Customer Service. In attempt to getting my girlfriend some Halloween themed flowers, Amy's Florist dropped the ball. I placed an order for one item and 5 minutes later they called and said they did not have the item or vase in stock YET I was still charged. After emailing and calling back, I was fully refunded. I decided to try my luck again and place another order but for a different item. Same thing, received a call saying it was not in stock. The people calling me were horribly unhelpful and rude and made it seem like I was to blame. Why have something on your website if it not in stock? I also find it suspicious Amy's Florist and Pat's Florist have the same exact webpage layouts besides color scheme. Trying my luck at a third floral shop and see if I finally can get something...

resp.text: Matthew, I am very sorry you had a bad experience with us. Yes you placed an order off our website that stated NO substitutions.  The closer it has gotten to Halloween we have sold out of most the containers. We would have been glad to do a similar arrangement for you but you said no substitutions. Also you did email us and I got back with you as soon as I seen the email, unfortunately I don't check my emails frequently.  The staff called and left you a message regarding the order, and soon as they spoke with you a refund was issued.  As for the two websites bringing the same...YES they are because a floral company designed them for us.  Nothing suspicious at all about that.  Again, I am very sorry we wasn't able to help you. It is not our goal to lose customers.

name: N Hinton
text: My Dad works here. The manager and staff are very cordial and my father ,one of the delivery guys, is extremely attentive and punctual in delivering the flowers. My Dad's a work-a-holic.

resp.text: I know several months have passed, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this wonderful review! We love having your dad on our team, and we appreciate your reaching out with an all-star rating. -Felisha, Owner

name: Ben Tuckerman
text: Friendly staff. Locally owned. Beautiful flowers. What's not to love!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben! Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else. Take care. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jack Przebienda
text: Flowers were delivered and my girlfriend absolutely loved them. Great Value, would recommend

resp.text: We are so glad she loved them. Thank you for call Amy's Florist. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Andrea White
text:
Really rude people! Terrible customer service.  Called to get more information on their flower arrangements, unfortunately their website is limited on options so I went on their Facebook page and was able to find a lot more options for what I was looking for.  I had to literally described them the flowers I was looking at, and told them it would be easier for them to jump on their page with me .... nop! They started getting all mad and raised their voice over the phone because THEY DIDN'T KNOW how to even use Facebook.  The woman that was on the phone with me even started talking over me.  WILL NEVER buy anything from here and WILL NEVER recommend this place.
One star is even too much!

resp.text: Andrea, we want all of our guests to feel comfortable when talking to us, so I'm sorry to hear about your experience. It sounds like there was a miscommunication here, and I appreciate the feedback. If you do choose to do business with us again, we'll work hard to make it a better experience. -Felisha, Owner

name: Pat Stephenson
text: Nice folks, but somehow they lost the order, it was a funeral so you only get one shot at it.

resp.text: Pat I'm sorry to hear this.  I have researched our data base and I'm not showing where an order was placed in your name.  I surely hope if the order was placed with us, that we took care of you to make sure you where completely satisfied.

name: Holly Holman
text: Extremely disappointed in Amy's.  I just sent my mother a birthday bouquet via Teleflora and paid extra for the Premium bouquet which featured a larger arrangement with more flowers (6 large roses and 6 smaller roses).  My mother just texted a picture of the flowers to say thank you and there are 2 roses and a bunch of filler flowers.  I'm in Kansas City, but believe if I were at home, I would be making my way to have a serious talk with Amy or whoever stole my money.  I could've gotten more money's worth out of a Publix bouquet.  I'm seriously angry.  This was NOT a $95 arrangement.

resp.text:
Hello Holly,
I'm so sorry you were disappointed in the arrangement. It's not our goal to make customers unhappy.  In this situation going through a 3rd party to place an order is not always the best thing to do. You mention you spent $95 on the arrangement but that's not what the sender gave us to work with. Also, out of the total, we had to take out for the 2 balloons and delivery charge that was associated with the order.  Yes, you could have got more flowers from Publix, but I don't sell Publix quality flowers. I only carry the freshest and finest. I agree the arrangement doesn't look like the picture you picked out and I'm more than happy to correct our mistake.  We want every customer to be completely satisfied ...that's our goal. We gain nothing from an unhappy customer!

name: Brian Patterson
text: I certainly wouldn't buy from a place that hangs up on its callers, as a vendor.... very unprofessional

resp.text: Not sure why you would make a statement as such!  My staff and I are very friendly to every caller unless you are a telemarketer.  We all know how annoying that can be.

name: Tara Campbell
text: Not so nice.  The person I ordered from had an attitude the entire time I was on the phone.  UA discount or not, I do not recommend.

name: Dale Dowdle
text: ALWAYS a Great Experience

resp.text: Dale, thanks so much for stopping in! Hope to see you here again, as always! -Felisha, Owner

name: Tamela Turbiville
text: I found 14 pez dispensers I didn't own. I have 2500 pez and been collecting for 22 yrs. I love this place,  will definitely go back!

name: Tony Riggs
text: Friendly ..lots of candy.

name: Roxanne Nguyen
text: Every year I come here for candies. This place is amazing and reasonable prices for bulk candies!  If you want candies this is your place!

name: Mr. Foot
text: I like candy. They have candy. And weird drinks. And candy that you may have had as a child, like candy cigarettes. Candy by the half pound. Hot candy. Chocolate candy. Everybdoy was super nice. Give your sweet tooth some love and get you some!

name: Brandon Styles Live
text: Milkshakes, soda pops and bulk candy, oh my! We have fun filling our bag full of new candies. The chocolate-covered gummy were a favorite and being able to add extra Oreo on top of our shake was a perfect bonus.

name: Brian Walsh
text: Awesome candy shop in Downtown OWA! Great selection of candies and sweets. My kids loved coming and creating their own bag of goodies. A definite stop if you are in the area.

name: Jess Mason
text: Prices are a little high especially for classic m&ms $6.99 for 1/2lb. Was told it would be cheaper. So a 1/4lb is 7.99 or 8? Yikes

name: SA Blu
text: Extremely over priced. I paid 30 dollars for a bottle of Alize and the cashiers tried to sneak and place the price on it after I questioned them about it. Will definitely not shop here again.

name: Alayna Jackson
text: There’s a lady who works here who is very unprofessional and hung up the phone in the midst of me asking a question. If this establishment is NOT actually open 24 hours, it would be nice to change it on google if they don’t want to answer questions. Very unprofessional. They only received a star because I couldn’t post this without a start. Smh.

name: Renae Bolles
text: What an awful place to shop!! I will never step foot in this place again!!! I refuse to shop somewhere where the employees are so rude!!!!

name: Brandy Anderson
text: The staff here are very cool and laid back. Great selection of your basic party liquor and beer and other items you may need. This location is open 24 hours now so that's a huge plus,  especially on weekends or holidays. This is one of my main go-to liquor stores.

name: nicole lee
text: Do not shop here their prices are outrageous you'll do better going to the liquor store where its alot cheaper all of them have bad attitudes.the store is small and nasty.

name: Kayelin Nettles
text: I called 3 times, & each time they hung up in my face. The last time I called, I asked to speak with a manager. The guy claimed that he was the manager, so I asked him why did he hang up in my face. He replied (with an attitude,) "Because we're busy!" I will never spend my money here again, EVER.

name: Iftekhar Alam Tushar
text: I love this Store. They got maximum kinds of liquor.  Their Beer, cigarettes price are cheaper than any other store in this area

name: Aayush Nepal
text: They have everything ! And plus they are open 24 hours which is awesome

name: Jesus Navarro
text: I’ve been here a couple of times. The candy selection is great. The gelato is delicious! There’s also many decorations for the home available. Definitely recommend!

name: SincerlyTee
text: First, this place is so cute AND clean! So neatly decorated and upon entering the staff was friendly & helpful! Stopped in for a quick gift and found myself some chocolates! The quality of the taste is far better than anything you can buy on the shelf! I will be back!! 5 stars!!!

name: K. Miller
text: Delicious. Worth the drive from up North.

name: Ruperto G. Rosado
text: They have a wide selection of chocolates and other treats and the store is very clean and organized. The staff is very friendly as well. If you want something of quality, this is the place for you. 10/10 recommended!

name: Marcus Kirby
text: This place is the best for candy and gelato!

name: G Smith
text: I am no chocolate or candy aficionado, but I have sent this candy to  clients for over 20 years.  Everyone on my list looks forward to it and  they want nothing else!  This candy is a southern tradition in Alabama.  Everyone who walks in the door finds a home.

name: Kid Kid
text: Very high in calories lol staff is awesome so was the sweets

name: Diane Slesinski
text: Very pleasant all the time.

name: Vicky Brewer
text: I received a gift basket for Christmas it included the peppermint /chocolate toffee, English toffee, cheese sticks,, heavenly bits and angel bits   OMG it was all delicious.  If you are looking for a Christmas gift or any occasion gift you cannot go wrong with these candies.  'Thank you for providing a perfect  basket of mouth watering delights..  And a big Thank you to my gifter!!!!!

name: mtuscaloosa
text: We saw this candy store on Facebook and decided to stop in during a trip to the area. The ladies working are all super nice and very helpful. The candy is so good! Lots of gift ideas and my wife loved all the different things they stock besides candy.  Very much worth a visit!

resp.text: Thank you for stopping in!  We hope to see you again soon!

name: Nancy Steadmon
text: Great candy. They did over 30 baskets for me for Christmas.  They were perfect.  The candies are so good

name: Erica Bridwell
text: Best toffee I've ever had! Stopped by to get some for my mom, who loves the toffee too, for mothers day. Got a sample of pineapple gelato. So good!

name: Faith Nugent
text: Such a cool store! You can watch the ladies make the candy, you walk in and it smells like heaven! Tons of candy and gifts to choose from. I purchased gummies, fudge, and caramels and all were delicious!

name: Adrienne Ballard
text: Very disappointed in the staff. Not once could I get help from the 4 employees inside. My husbands birthday is tomorrow and I really wanted to make him a nice basket of treats. But when you walk in, don’t get greeted, don’t get asked if you need help (even after spending 10 minutes inside wondering around). But the two women who walked in before me got asked if they needed help by 3 different women and then the woman after me got asked. After spending $23 on a few pieces of chocolate sure do hope they taste good. Now I know not to waste my lunch break here.

resp.text:
Hi Adrienne,

I am so sorry that this was your experience! Thank you for your feedback. We will work to ensure that all feel welcome in the candy store. I hope your husband enjoyed the chocolate!

Morgan Price Candy Company

name: Venessa Leffers
text: Love having this store in Decatur! English Toffee and Macadamia Nut Toffee are wonderful!! Great place for teacher gifts.

name: Northern Hikes
text: Was unable to attend a special birthday for my niece who lives in Decatur. After a five minute conversation with a helpful  employee, my basket was selected and on it's way. I was blown away when  my niece tested me  two hours later to say thanks. I highly recommend this store.

name: TJ Brakefield
text: The ladies here make some really awesome treats. Out of everything I bought for my girlfriend on Valentine's I recommend the chocolate covered espresso beans above all else, providing you're into that sort of thing.

name: Sherry Nelson
text: Yummy. Need i say more. All kinds of delicious treats.

name: Cynthia Mote
text: Delicious candy!! Really nice employees!!

name: Tammy Hogan
text: Cute shop! English Toffee is so delicious!! Yum!! Will go again!

name: Jennifer Mills Griffis
text: Best sweet treats ever 😍

name: Bob Peters
text:
Bob Peters here,

Sweet Mother of all things sweet. This place makes me head bang! Every bit of candy I've had is a total screamer. I pick up 50lbs before every canoe trip I go on.

name: Donna Cooper
text: English Toffee is delicious!

name: Karaline
text: If you're not sure what to try, get a basic sea salt caramel. They are heavenly and melt in your mouth.

name: Jeremiah Comer
text: I ordered by phone for a Christmas delivery. Everything was good, but i requested a three tiered box and they received a single box. :/

name: Gary McClimans
text: Wonderful little store! Great service and wide selection.

name: Kimberly Gordon
text: I love this place ..Geloto is sinful 😍

name: Jerry Nobles
text: Excellent in every aspect! Service,quality,clenliness

name: Chandler Reynolds
text: It's pricey but delicious. If you're looking for a treat this is the place to find it!

name: Lisa Pendergrast
text: Amazing place. All i can say is TRUFFLES TRUFFLES TRUFFLES!!!!!

name: Leslie Maxwell
text: Yummy candies and cute merch as well

name: CJ
text: Great toffee

name: Teri Watson
text: Delicious!

name: Rodney Alexander
text: Best place in America to buy handmade candy!!!!!! Thanks Mrs Nancy

name: CJ
text: Great gifts holidays

name: Ray Long
text: Great candy

name: Steve Garner
text: Smells like chocolate and they make the goodies in front of you. Multiple viewer choice awards from The Decatur Daily.

name: Ann Gebhart
text: Wonderful

name: Presley Jenkins
text: I like candy.

name: Jimmy Ray Smith (JRay)
text: Best little chocolate place around

name: Robert Martin
text: Really great... little pricey...

name: Paul Spell
text: Good selection of special chocolates

name: Ryutaro Ozaki
text:
(Translated by Google) I was invited by a sweet smell.
I think that it is good for your use ~.

(Original)
あま〜い香りに誘われて。
お使い物にいいと思います〜。

name: Sandra
text: Awesome pecans and the price is great usually buy 5-lbs at a time and freeze what I'm not using right away. People are very friendly and they have interesting gift ideas.

name: Josh Moffett
text: Super nice and a lot information great prices

name: Hannah Barnett
text: Awesome pecans and great service!

name: Brenda Finch
text: Didn't go in but building and parking lot clean and very nice

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Love it

name: Sherrell Breashears
text: I love the store on Montclair Road. It is a very clean, neat store with an excellent customer service staff ready to assist you with whatever you need. The products are great for people living on a budget.  I cannot say enough about how pleased my experience has been there.

name: Kenneth Rich
text: A very creative store.the merchandise is far better than the dollar tree. Always great customer service.

name: Nee nee
text: Will not be back at this one . I already called  cooperate. Nasty attitudes and not customer service trained.

name: Bridgett Fortenberry
text: Nice , clean

name: Wesley Packer
text: They still got it, them sweet treats

name: Mattie Adams
text: Love it. A friend sent me over there to pick up something for her but I ended up getting a few things for myself... It was my first time going and I was very satisfied ❤ and the candy apples were delicious.

name: Latranza Hicks
text: Out of what I went for. But overall great

name: Amy Pettway
text: Best sweetburger in town

name: Duriel Moore
text: The best spot in the city for homemade burgers and treats made right!

name: Cherokee KurleeGirl
text: This shop is located in the heart of Trinity Garden in Mobile Alabama and they have the biggest best tasting burgers a person can ask for😋

name: Pastor Annie Young Thompson
text: I love home made candy n the candy apples are great, so is sweet popcorn.

name: Charles Hunt
text: Get food

name: Kay Bee
text: Food was fresh and delicious.

name: tracey adams
text: Love it

name: Lena Kidd
text: I love sweet snack shop

name: Ryan Earhart
text: Great food

name: Gregory Cheatum
text: The best candy apples

name: Toriana Pettaway
text: Best Praline in the South.

name: Kerm L
text: Great food and sweets

name: Destin2begrt
text: Good candy apples

name: Shaniqua Ellis
text: Cause you all open when you want and food doesn't be ready in time, do not answer phone,and do not have the business hours or days up on website or on door of business place

name: Demetrius Johnson
text: Good food

name: Kendall Goodwin
text: Awesome Spot!!

name: Tom Wiley Jr
text: Amazing

name: Blane Riedlinger
text: Free my man zo he was doing his best and this manger was hating Tammy mad rude and the service is below par

name: Deshaun Holmes
text: Terrible service and bad attitudes, tried to ask a manager where to find something and they gave me a attitude and told me to ask someone. And it smells oddly weird in there.

name: Shonna Buford
text: Bad service was very rude apparently they dont want bussines because we left money in the car went out to get it come tried to come back in and she would not let us in said they were closing my family was in there and we will not be going back

name: Jessie Robinson
text: I love 5 below
